通过从`K`中选择属性`T`来构造类型，例如

```ts
interface Todo {
  title: string
  description: string
  completed: boolean
}

type TodoPreview = MyPick<Todo, 'title' | 'completed'>

const todo: TodoPreview = {
    title: 'Clean room',
    completed: false,
}
```

### Answer

```ts
//! Pass
type Include<T, U> = T extends U ? T : never;

export type MyPick<T, U> = {
    [K in Include<keyof T, U>]: T[K];
};
```
